prompts: Create a mischievous poison-type Pokemon known for its sneaky habits and unique color pattern.
Generate a cute yet cunning Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a distinct smell.
Design a creature that resembles a skunk, combining elements of both dark and poison types.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its noxious gas as a defense mechanism, adorned with purple and cream colors.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies stealth and cunning, perfect for a forest habitat with camouflage abilities.
Show me a small, quadrupedal Pokemon that blends into its surroundings and has a playful nature.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its trickster personality, often found in urban areas with a unique scent.
